name: OPD Summary Report
query:
SELECT 
    date as Date,
    
    SUM(CASE WHEN gender = 'Male' AND patient_age >= 18 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS `Adult Male Patients`,
    SUM(CASE WHEN gender = 'Female' AND patient_age >= 18 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS `Adult Female Patients`,
    
    SUM(CASE WHEN patient_age <= 17 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS `Total Child`,
    COUNT(*) AS `Total Patients`
FROM `tabQue`
WHERE date BETWEEN %(from)s AND %(to)s
AND que_type != 'Refer'
AND status != 'Canceled'
group by date;
